description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBang-A-Rang:
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB}, this creature afflicts it with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}. If the enemy already has these debuffs, their potency is increased by 30% instead.
name: NT4 Explosive Powder
